import React from "react"; import Game from "./components/game"; import "./App.css"; function App() { return (

How to play

Write a 4-digit secret number.

The digits must be all different. If the matching digits are in their right positions, they are "bulls", if in different positions, they are "cows".

Example:
  • Secret number: 4271
Opponent's try: 1234 Answer: 1 bull and 2 cows. (The bull is "2", the cows are "4" and "1".) The first one to reveal the other's secret number in the least number of guesses wins the game.
); } export default App;
